location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Andrew Ramsay, Robert Sparks, and John Beaumont, at Bombay Castle, to Charles Watkins, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter gives notification that Rawson Hart Boddam has left the Bombay Presidency and Andrew Ramsay is his replacement, with John Beaumont joining the Council.Enclosed is an extract of a letter from from the Governor General and Council at Fort William, in Bengal, to Bombay Castle, dated 5 November 1787. It contains a further request for plants for the new botanical garden at Bengal.
